nodes.text: Clan Flashblade was one of the districts of the city of Phemiss, the capital of the planet New Plympto. It bordered six other districts, and was the home of Clan Flashblade, with which the district shared its name. Like the rest of the city, the district's homes were adobe and were grouped together in circular blocks. The district also contained Fort Plympto.
Clan Flashblade was mentioned in the 2003 Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook Coruscant and the Core Worlds, which was published by Wizards of the Coast.
